SEARCH
Package cdx.opencdx.commons.service

Interface OpenCDXCurrentUser

All Known Implementing Classes:
OpenCDXCurrentUserImpl
public interface OpenCDXCurrentUser
The OpenCDXCurrentUser interface defines methods to manage the current authenticated user.
Implementation Note:
This implementation would only require changes if Spring Security was repleased.

    • getCurrentUser

      OpenCDXIAMUserModel getCurrentUser()

      Model for hte current user.

    • getCurrentUser

      OpenCDXIAMUserModel getCurrentUser(OpenCDXIAMUserModel defaultUser)
      Metho to get the current authenticated user, or return the default user. User primarly for non-authenticated calls.
      Parameters:
      defaultUser - Default user to reutrn if no currently authenticated users.
      Returns:
      Model for the current user.

    • configureAuthentication

      void configureAuthentication(String role)
      Method to assign the System as the current user with the specified role.
      Parameters:
      role - Role to assign to the system user.

    • allowBypassAuthentication

      void allowBypassAuthentication(boolean allowBypassAuthentication)
      Method to assign the System as the current user with the specified role.
      Parameters:
      allowBypassAuthentication - Flag to bypass authentication.

    • checkCurrentUser

      OpenCDXIAMUserModel checkCurrentUser(OpenCDXIAMUserModel defaultUser)
      Method to check the current user against the default user.
      Parameters:
      defaultUser - Default user to return if no current user.
      Returns:
      Model for the current user.

    • getCurrentUserAccessToken

      String getCurrentUserAccessToken()
      Method to get the current user's access token.
      Returns:
      String containing the access token.
